entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 09:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 2.8°C
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: SSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy this morning then to a few rain showers this afternoon. Fog patches developing this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
